comments.body: Thanks. Please just use single backticks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +77,81 @@In order to run kubernetes you must have the kubernetes code on the local machine. Cloning this repository is sufficient.

```$ git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes.git```

The `--depth=1` parameter is optional and will ensure a smaller download.

comments.body:
How about adding a requirements section:

```
### Requirements 

 - Linux 
 - Docker 1.0.0+

Not running Linux? Consider running Linux in a local virtual machine with [Vagrant](vagrant.md), or on a cloud provider like [Google Compute Engine](gce.md)
```
